onset.Description: Time of event onset, in seconds, measured from the start of the EEG recording.

duration.Description: Duration of the event, in seconds.

sample.Description: EEG data sample index at which the event occurred.

value.Description: Event code or label indicating the type of event.

Levels.PHOTO 5Hz: Presentation onset of a 5 Hz flickering photic stimulus.
Levels.PHOTO 10Hz: Presentation onset of a 10 Hz flickering photic stimulus.
Levels.PHOTO 15Hz: Presentation onset of a 15 Hz flickering photic stimulus.
Levels.PHOTO 20Hz: Presentation onset of a 20 Hz flickering photic stimulus.
